name: How to get Passivhaus right
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The good, the bad and the ugly - does Passivhaus mean unacceptable design compromises and high costs? This session explores how much Passivhaus costs compared to conventional approaches and the impact Passivhaus has on architecture.Discussing and exploring how to do Passivhaus with new technologies and innovations.

presentations.name: Passivhaus doesn't cost more - discuss, exploring issues about payback period
presentations.speakers: Jane Barnes, Senior Project Manager, Davis Langdon

presentations.name: Beautiful buildings - Does passivhaus mean bad design?
presentations.speakers:

Pete Warm, Warm Associates

presentations.name: Case Study - Beautiful Building - Crossway PH house:
presentations.speakers: Richard Hawkes, Hawkes Architecture (Crossways PH house)
